text: Quelle chute dans la qualité/l'accueil.depuis le changement du proprio.apres une fréquentation assidue depuis des lustres j'ai décidé de ne plus y aller.dommage
Eating here for years quality is always on top, never had a problem fro mthe veal schnitzel to the BBQ chicken the whole menu is amazing and the soups aswell. Quality price ratio is spot on.
Old school Polish charcutterie with all the goodies you could want. Also serves amazing veal cutlet sammiches for lunch.
